n: World's Easiest and Most Amazing Two-Ingredient Dip
des: "This creamy dip is great for all things potato (fries and chips especially) and also makes a great steak dip. It's even good spread on a roast beef sandwich!  Everyone loves it, and no one can guess what's in it. The combination of the two ingredients is surprisingly different than either alone. I strongly encourage using KikkomanÂ® soy sauce, as other brands I have tried tasted very different and not nearly as good."
ins: Mix sour cream and soy sauce together in a bowl until evenly combined.
